import string

def break_down_text(text):
    text = text.translate(str.maketrans('MUTATED', '', string.punctuation))
    words = text.split()
    words = [word.lower() for word in words]
    words = list(set(words))
    return words

import string

def break_down_text(text):
    text = text.translate(str.maketrans('', 'MUTATED', string.punctuation))
    words = text.split()
    words = [word.lower() for word in words]
    words = list(set(words))
    return words
